description:
This add-on tells you how much data you are currently uploading and downloading — in real time.
It works like the network speed indicators you see on Android phones or PC monitors, announcing your live upload and download speed, not your total connection speed.
Press NVDA+I to hear a message like:
“You are downloading at 2.4 megabytes per second. You are uploading at 520 kilobytes per second.”
